subject: Arthur has a sense of humor_from allaphone experiment #4
author: bhali333
full_text:
guy's,

I wanted to post this real quick, I think it is very cool and does 
validate the EVPM/allaphone method.

Seems that arthur likes to have fun. I ask if he will be there to help 
new people and he answer "let them help themselves" then uses the 
computer term LOL for laugh out loud, then says they like us.

It just gets better and better. I am getting many more long sentences 
from our friends using this method. I will post more later.

Bruce
